data.elexonDERSYdata: SELECT *, DATE_ADD(settlementDate, INTERVAL (settlementPeriod - 1 ) * 30 MINUTE) AS time FROM elexonDERSYdata ORDER BY time;
data.rseClearout: SELECT *, settlementDate + INTERVAL (settlementPeriod - 1) DIV 2 HOUR AS time FROM rseMarket WHERE clearoutPrice IS NOT NULL AND clearoutVolume IS NOT NULL ORDER BY time;
data.rseMarketData: SELECT *, DATE_ADD(settlementDate, INTERVAL (settlementPeriod - 1) DIV 2 HOUR) + INTERVAL (settlementPeriod - 1) % 2 * 30 MINUTE AS time FROM rseMarket ORDER BY time;
data.error: WITH A AS (SELECT * FROM pricePrediction ORDER BY time), B AS (SELECT *, DATE_ADD(settlementDate, INTERVAL (settlementPeriod - 1 ) * 30 MINUTE) AS time FROM elexonDERSYdata ORDER BY time) SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(A.time))) AS dateOnly, ROUND(SQRT(AVG(POWER(A.price - B.systemBuyPrice, 2))), 2) AS rmse FROM A JOIN B WHERE A.time = B.time GROUP BY dateOnly HAVING rmse IS NOT NULL;
